member.summary: Gets the JniPeerMemberss.

member.name: P:FM.IceLink.Android.UnmarshaledCamera.IUnmarshaledPreviewCallbackInvoker.ThresholdClass
member.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
member.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.
member.remarks: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

member.name: P:FM.IceLink.Android.UnmarshaledCamera.IUnmarshaledPreviewCallbackInvoker.ThresholdType
member.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
member.value: A which provides the declaring type.
member.remarks: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual method invocation.

member.summary: Disposes.
